desc: Barking Dog Roasters offers exquisite coffee roasted on a vintage Probat L12. As well as fresh homemade pastries everyday. Right in the heart of the Sonoma Valley. Brewed coffee, espresso drinks: latte, cappuccino, mocha, iced coffee. Fresh Baked Pastries: muffin, croissant, scone, cookie, bagel, breakfast.

layout.text: Roasting in the Valley of the Moon since 1995.
